column4: of coruse - even windows. dosent include the  latest drivers for nvidia or ati cards  either. :)
Heck the wirless vendors seem to like to use different terms for the same thing under windows. :P   Im suprised their stuff works as well under linux as it does.
I just constantly get the feeling that Wireless Is being shoved out to the public.. befor its ready.
